articles.description: A dedicated class of old-time skiers keep having fun in the mountains while staying safe—using training tools that could help athletes of all ages
articles.content:
Balance, strength and body control decline as we age. Older skiers can counteract the effects with two hard and fast rules: Be willing to train and know your limits on the slopes. 
At 104, Klaus Obe… [+294 chars]

articles.author: Yasmine Singh, Ciera Velarde
articles.title: 29 Cute, Cheap Stocking Stuffers That May Be Small But Will Bring Major Joy - BuzzFeed
articles.description: These stocking stuffers are so good, they might even be better than the gifts they have under the tree.
